text: Jacques Beurlet (21 December 1944 – 26 September 2020) was a Belgian footballer. He was born in Marche-en-Famenne, Belgium. During his career he played for R. Standard de Liège. He played for the Belgium national football team. Beurlet died on 26 September 2020 at the age of 75.Jacky Beurlet est décédé ==References== ==Other websites== *Royal Belgian Football Association: Number of caps Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Belgian footballers Category:Belgium at the 1970 FIFA World Cup
title: Jacques Beurlet
